title: BRIEF-Philippine Stock Exchange Unit Approved Issuance Of 2 MLN Shares Worth 200 MLN Pesos
text:
BRIEF-Philippine Stock Exchange Unit Approved Issuance Of 2 MLN Shares Worth 200 MLN Pesos

Stock Markets 58 minutes ago (Sep 20, 2019 09:30)

BRIEF-Philippine Stock Exchange Unit Approved Issuance Of 2 MLN Shares Worth 200 MLN Pesos Sept 20 (Reuters) - Philippine Stock Exchange Inc :

* UNIT APPROVED ISSUANCE OF 2 MILLION SHARES WORTH 200

MILLION

PESOS

* CO WILL ALSO FULLY PAY UNPAID SUBSCRIPTION IN AMOUNT OF 50

MILLION PESOS

* UNIT WILL USE THE INVESTMENT TO PARTIALLY FUND THE

PURCHASE OF A

NEW CLEARING AND SETTLEMENT SYSTEM



Source text for Eikon: ID:nPSX5vk5kk

Further company coverage: PSE.PS





BRIEF-Philippine Stock Exchange Unit Approved Issuance Of 2 MLN Shares Worth 200 MLN Pesos
description: BRIEF-Philippine Stock Exchange Unit Approved Issuance Of 2 MLN Shares Worth 200 MLN Pesos
